title: Test
yAxis: Inflation rate compared to previous year
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Inflation rate compared to previous year, with a total of 21 data points.
Overall Inflation rate compared to previous year has increased over the Year

Inflation rate compared to previous year is rapidly increasing from 2004 to 2008, rapidly decreasing from 2008 to 2010, rapidly increasing from 2010 to 2011, rapidly decreasing from 2011 to 2014, rapidly increasing from 2014 to 2015, roughly constant from 2015 to 2016, rapidly increasing from 2016 to 2017, gradually decreasing from 2017 to 2018, and lastly roughly constant from 2018 to 2024.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2008 and 2009.
Max Inflation rate compared to previous year about 11.16 was recorded at Year 2008
Min Inflation rate compared to previous year about 0.24 was recorded at Year 2014
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Inflation rate compared to previous year, with a total of 21 data points. The chart has 6 significant trends.
The longest trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 2017 to 2021.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2004 to 2008.
Additionally, the next significant trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 2021 to 2024.
But, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2014 to 2017.
Similarly, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2011 to 2014.
Differently, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2008 to 2011.
